name: analyze
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seo_checker.
Tool description: SEO Website Checker, Extraction and Analyze/Analytic Tools Report
I'm on telegram chat me if there a problem/request
https://t.me/iiyann25
API description: Analyzes the page speed of a given URL using the specified strategy and category.

url.description: The URL of the page to be analyzed.

strategy.description: The strategy to use, either 'desktop' or 'mobile'. Default is None.

category.description: The category for which to analyze, options include 'accessibility', 'best-practices', 'performance', 'seo', and 'pwa'. Default is 'performance'.
